> **A marine biologist and ecologist utilising the power of data science tools.**

## Scope

-   **Teach and educate about the marine environment**\
    Through presentations, lectures, posts and other educational materials I advocate marine environment importance.\
    Some of my work includes [posters made with the Nature and Parks Authority in Israel](https://www.parks.org.il/article/%d7%9b%d7%a8%d7%96%d7%95%d7%aa-%d7%99%d7%9e%d7%99%d7%95%d7%aa/) (in Hebrew).

-   **Clean, analyse and visualise data\
    **In our visual world, we tend to understand things better when they are presented to us this way. I believe that using the right tools to create meaningful insights from data is key in understanding processes and changes.

## Skills

-   **R language** and **RStudio** (aka *'posit'*)
-   **SQL**
-   **GIS**: ArcGIS and qGIS
-   I can also build websites with Quarto (like this one!), HTML and CSS.
